statements: SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 5;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT medication_name FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 101 AND dosage > 50
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Daily' ORDER BY dosage DESC
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 201 OR frequency = 'Every 12 hours'
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage BETWEEN 25 AND 50 ORDER BY medication_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE frequency LIKE '%hours'
SELECT * FROM patient_prescriptions;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM patient_prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dosage_schedule WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT schedule_id, prescription_id, schedule_time FROM dosage_schedule ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_prescriptions JOIN dosage_schedule ON patient_prescriptions.prescription_id = dosage_schedule.prescription_id;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 10 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_time, quantity FROM dosage_schedule WHERE prescription_id = 2 ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name, dosage FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage_mg FROM medications WHERE dosage_mg > 50;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage_schedule FROM patients JOIN prescription_details ON patients.patient_id = prescription_details.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, dosage_mg FROM medications WHERE dosage_mg > 100;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_id, dosage_schedule FROM prescription_details WHERE patient_id = 1;

SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medication_name, dosage_mg FROM patients JOIN prescription_details ON patients.patient_id = prescription_details.patient_id JOIN medications ON prescription_details.medication_id = medications.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE medication_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY dosage_mg DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, medication_description FROM Medications WHERE medication_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, prescription_date FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM DosageSchedules WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Prescriptions.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_id, prescription_date FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, DosageSchedules.schedule_time FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Prescriptions.medication_id = Medications.medication_id JOIN DosageSchedules ON Prescriptions.prescription_id = DosageSchedules.prescription_id ORDER BY DosageSchedules.schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT medication_name, description FROM medications;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';

SELECT p.patient_name, m.medication_name, pr.dosage, pr.frequency FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.medication_id WHERE pr.dosage > 10;
SELECT d.doctor_name, d.specialty, count(p.doctor_id) as patient_count FROM doctors d LEFT JOIN prescriptions p ON d.doctor_id = p.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_id ORDER BY patient_count DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, ps.dosage_time, ps.dosage_quantity FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN dosage_schedule ps ON pr.prescription_id = ps.prescription_id WHERE p.patient_id = 1;
